Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted India as the favorites given their home advantage
Australia will be on wafer-thin ice if they lose
India's net run rate gives them a decent safety net
Travis Head vs Jasprit Bumrah will be a great battle
Post-Match Reflections: Mitchell Marsh emphasized that the team has a lot of belief in their group
Rohit Sharma said that in T20s, they don't believe you need to get fifties and hundreds, how you can put pressure on the opposition is what matters
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain threatened high stakes India-Australia clash at T20 World Cup
St Lucia has been the most batting-friendly venue of this T20 World Cup in terms of both scoring rate and average
Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma are separated by just 30 runs on top of India's run-scoring leaderboard in T20Is
Others: India have a 3-2 edge over Australia in their T20 World Cup meetings so far
Arshdeep Singh is India's highest wicket-taker in this World Cup with 12 strikes at the rate of one every 10 balls
